sounds.name: VGM Hall of Fame - Butasan Quest - Sky High Adventure (X68000)
VGM Hall Of Fame - Cyberblock Metal Orange EX - Stage 1 (X68000)

input0: And use SPACEBAR to shoot and destroy enemy ships
Do try to dodge both the ENEMIES and their pesky LASERS
Don't forget to collect POWERUPS and MEDKITS too
Two will improve your weapon and one will heal you
Hitting enemy ships DIRECTLY will TAKE away your upgrade LEVELS
So do yourself a favour and dodge the BEST you can
